description:
Suzu`s close friend and constant confidante. She has a sarcastic wit honed by many Internet interactions. She is the one that invites Suzu to the online world of "U," and acts as the producer of Suzu`s character Belle. She is a key person in the story, being the only one that knows of the person behind Belle.
Source: ANN
name: Betsuyaku Hiroka
